pageContext.claim: “I believe that if people stopped using or subscribing to @ATT, they would be forced to make big changes at @CNN, which is dying in the ratings anyway. It is so unfair with such bad, Fake News! Why wouldn't they act. When the World watches @CNN, it gets a false picture of USA. Sad!”
pageContext.analysis: CNN's ratings increased 7 percent year over year in the first quarter of 2019.
